CustomField.description: When selecting "Yes" an automatic program feedback survey will be sent to the "Survey Resend Email for GetFeedback" email address located just above this field on the associated training contact.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When selecting "Yes" an automatic program feedback survey will be sent to the "Survey Resend Email for GetFeedback" email address located just above this field on the associated training contact.
CustomField.label: Resend Survey Link
